plays.text: Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Interference Jason Spezza
Goal scored by Mike Fisher assisted by Peter Schaefer AND Chris Neil

Penalty to Brian McGrattan 5 minutes for Fighting Wade Belak
Penalty to Wade Belak 5 minutes for Fighting Brian McGrattan
Goal scored by Tie Domi assisted by Tomas Kaberle AND Alexander Steen
Penalty to Anton Volchenkov 2 minutes for Holding Nik Antropov
Penalty to Chris Neil 2 minutes for High Sticking Jeff O'Neill
Penalty to Nik Antropov 2 minutes for Hooking Chris Phillips
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Hooking Chris Neil
Goal scored by Wade Redden assisted by Dany Heatley AND Daniel Alfredsson
Penalty to Wade Redden 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Bryan Smolinski assisted by Antoine Vermette AND Anton Volchenkov
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Tripping Nik Antropov
Penalty to Alexander Steen 2 minutes for Hooking Peter Schaefer
Goal scored by Kyle Wellwood assisted by Tie Domi AND Jeff O'Neill
Penalty to Nik Antropov 2 minutes for Crosschecking Antoine Vermette
Penalty to Dominik Hasek 2 minutes for High Sticking Tie Domi served by Patrick Eaves
Goal scored by Nik Antropov assisted by Mats Sundin AND Ken Klee
